item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Hi Matthew - thanks for picking up the T-shirts for me! While your over in the states, I have the privilege of seeing one of my favourite American musicians, Bob Mould (solo artist and former frontman of Sugar and Husker Du) make a rare appearance over here in England: www.bobmould.com . Si</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi Matthew – thanks for picking up the T-shirts for me! While your over in the states, I have the privilege of seeing one of my favourite American musicians, Bob Mould (solo artist and former frontman of Sugar and Husker Du) make a rare appearance over here in England: http://www.bobmould.com/ . Si
